replies.body:
Unfortunately, you aren't **guaranteed** access to the PBE simply by applying. We select testers in batches, with criteria that changes each invite wave, depending on what we're testing at the moment. I can't manually review your application, but I recommend you continue to *actively* play the game and aim to be a positive influence on your fellow summoners, as those are qualities we often look for. I recommend checking out our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for more information on how the system works.

Let me know if you have any questions.
